name: Emunition
description:
"Alternatively, 'terra incognita' may also refer to the hypothesized continent Terra Australis Incognita ("The unknown land of the South"), as seen in the Theatrum Orbis Terrarum map by Abraham Ortelius (1570)." Terra incognita - Wikipedia

THE EMUS HAVE BEEN TERRORIZING AUSTRALIA FOR TOO LONG

95% of the country is uninhabited! Why? The deadly heat? The barren wasteland?

No

(well, yes)

it's the FUCKING EMUS THAT TOOK OVER THE LAND IN THE EMU WARS.

Well, NO MORE! They took over the land and invaded our farms. It's time to take the fight to them! Raid the Emu's Den and take back what's ours!

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys to plan movement

IJKL to plan shooting

Ctrl to Defend/Wait out an action

Enter to execute your actions

Escape to exit the game

Credits

PixelTaku - Lead Art, Lead Game Design
